mapper.sql: SELECT a.id, a.action_group_id, ag.name as action_group_name, ag.description as action_group_description, ag.enabled as action_group_enabled, a.owner_id, a.name, a.action_url, a.action_type, a.landing_id, a.landing_start_at, a.landing_end_at, a.landing_destination_url, a.default_rule_type, a.created_by, a.created_at, a.updated_by, a.updated_at FROM action a JOIN action_group ag on a.action_group_id = ag.id
mapper.select: INSERT INTO action ( action_group_id, owner_id, name, action_url, action_type, landing_id, landing_start_at, landing_end_at, landing_destination_url, created_by, updated_by ) VALUES ( #{actionGroupId}, #{ownerId}, #{name}, #{actionUrl}, #{actionType}, #{landingId}, #{landingStartAt}, #{landingEndAt}, #{landingDestinationUrl}, #{ownerId}, #{ownerId} ) RETURNING *

UPDATE action SET action_group_id = #{actionGroupId}, owner_id = #{ownerId}, name = #{name}, action_url = #{actionUrl}, action_type = #{actionType}, landing_start_at = #{landingStartAt}, landing_end_at = #{landingEndAt}, landing_destination_url = #{landingDestinationUrl}, default_rule_type = #{defaultRuleType}, updated_by = #{ownerId}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id} AND owner_id = #{ownerId} RETURNING *
